meanings.definition: A bag with shoulder straps for carrying items on one's back.
meanings.sent1: I always carry my books in my backpacks to school.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new backpacks for her hiking trip.
meanings.sent3: The backpacks looked like a turtle shell on his back.
meanings.sent4: Her backpacks was a trusty companion on all her adventures.
meanings.sent5: The colorful backpacks stood out in the sea of students.

meanings.definition: To carry items in a backpack.
meanings.sent1: He backpacks his snacks for the long journey.
meanings.sent2: They backpacks all their camping gear for the trip.
meanings.sent3: She backpacks like a pro, fitting everything perfectly.
meanings.sent4: Backpacking through Europe, they discovered new cultures.
meanings.sent5: Backpacking allows you to explore with ease and freedom.
